name: Ext_R2_QR_gr_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.QuestionnaireResponse.group.subject for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents QuestionnaireResponse.group.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/QuestionnaireResponse|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: The subject this group's answers are about
element.definition: More specific subject this section's answers are about, details the subject given in QuestionnaireResponse.
element.comment: `QuestionnaireResponse.item.text` maps to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.text`. So is mapped as Equivalent. Mapping of FHIR R3:QuestionnaireResponse element `QuestionnaireResponse.item.subject` to R4:QuestionnaireResponse element ``
